thread.title: 'Machine' trailer out! Watch Mustafa and Kiara Advani in action
thread.title_full: 'Machine' trailer out! Watch Mustafa and Kiara Advani in action - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: 'Machine' trailer out! Watch Mustafa and Kiara Advani in action
text:
A still from 'Machine' trailer. Pics/YouTube 
The trailer of Mustafa and Kiara Advani's 'Machine' is out! The film promises loads of action and romance.
Watch 'Mustafa' trailer 

Mustafa, son of director Abbas, says for him the most challenging task was to lose around 70 kgs for his debut film 'Machine'.
"I was 120 kgs and would eat anything and everything because I was and I am still a foodie," Mustafa said in a statement earlier.
Also read:  Revealed! How 'Machine' actor Mustafa lost 70 kilos 

A still from 'Machine' trailer 
Produced by AD films (Haresh Patel), Pranay Chokshi, Dhaval Jayantilal Gada (DG) and Abbas-Mustan.

A still from 'Machine' trailer 
The film is directed by Abbas-Mustan and is slated to release on March 24.
Also read:  'Machine' teaser out! Salman Khan calls Mustafa Burmawalla and Kiara Advani's promo 'supercool' 
 
Also read:  Abbas-Mastan to launch South African Carla Dennis in 'Machine' 
 
Also read:  Expect a big announcement from Kiara Advani soon!
